channel.title: EvolutionX || Need Beta Testers || Getting VPS || Spawn || Stable
channel.description:
[center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15430412/EvolutionPk.gif[/img]
[u]Theres a small Typo in the banner it is supposed to say EvolutionX, LoL it will be fixed soon.[/u]
[b][u]Info[/u][/b]: [b]Server Name[/b]: EvolutionX [b]Server Base[/b]: Project Insanity [b]Developers[/b]: Mr Extremez [b]Gfx Designer[/b]: Ali aka Stubernsnake on here [b]My Msn[/b]: kingrsps@hotmail.com
[b]Goals[/b]: -50 + Players weekends, 30 + week days. -Very active pking -Very Few Glitches -Make Server More Stable
[b]Features[/b]: -Holds around 300 -Spawning with some items that cost PKP -Great Combat -99 % Lagg Free -Not eveyone can have curses they cost 300 PKP to use them but it is not subtracted from you (You just need that amount) -We have a vps -All Players can do ::master, ::pure, ::setlevel, and ::item, there is resistrictions for some items though -Killstreaks -Firecape Minigame to get a firecape -Duel arena staking for pk points (Coming Soon) -Fullscreen Mode, (For Client Only, for Webclient will come later on) -Over 10 + Areas to pk at -New Bank Interface with, Deposit Inventory Button Without Lagg and Equipment button coming soon -Fully Functional Report Abuse -4 Starter Packs to Chose From (Main, Range, Pure, Hybrid) -You can't Xfer because it checks if you have the same ip, same with pking. -You can change your display name with ::display name, to change it back do ::resetdisplay credits to allen video here
http://youtu.be/I8KaVFmcXsc
[b]Media[/b]:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/21abfc9.png[/img]
[u]Starter Pack, every Player gets to pick one of there choice.[/u] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/30bh9c8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2btf6t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mc5fmx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/258164p.png[/img]
[u]Some of the places you can pk at.[/u] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/23h4y9h.png[/img]
[u]More places you can pk at.[/u] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2jawwgh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/w4rrr.png[/img]
[b]Information About PKP[/b]: [code]Layout = Item: Amount Dragon Claws: 750 Ags: 650 Bandos Tassets/ChestPlate: 400 Dragonfire Shield: 150 Spirit Shields: divine = 500, ely = 400, arcane = 300 Perfect Ring: 2147000000 Fire cape: 150 Staff Of Light: 200 Chaotics: Chaotic Rapier: 500, Chaotic Maul: 400, Chaotic Longsword: 350 Hand Cannon: 300 Torva Peices: 500 Virtus Peices: 300 Vesta Armour: 250, Vesta Longswords: 550 Statius Armour: 250, Statius warhammer: 450 Primal: 400 Saradomin Sword: 400 Party hats: 500 H'ween masks: 400 Santa hat: 400 Dragon defender: 125 Vine whip: 200 (i) Rings: 150 Arcane stream: 250 (THIS IS HOW MUCH IT COSTS TO SPAWN THESE ITEMS) ----------------- Curse Prayers: 300 ----------------- Vote for cash will be implemented soon and will be 20 pk points per vote or more (Probably). ----------------- First kill is 1 pkp then they advance .5 pkp then more as you advance your killstreak.[/code]
[b]Spots Available[/b]:
-Beta Testers: 0/How ever many Applies and i Accept.
[b]How to Apply[/b]:
[b]Beta Testers[/b]:
[code]Name: Age: How active will you be: Any experience in this?: Msn:[/code]
[u]Thanks for reading trolls will be reported, i need all the supporters i can get and beta testers ofc :D[/u]
[u]All Beta testers will be taken into note, the server will probably be up this weekend when the vps is ready.[/u] [u]We don't have forums yet but they will be made soon.[/center]

@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:43, topic:430885”]Message me on here whenever this is online or you can contact me through my new MSN : iDontLikeToRun@live.com[/quote]Will add you now I’m getting on msn.

Still Interested in a VPS Hoster because the old hoster is having to many problems need one asap.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:5, topic:431059”]That is your response to what I had to say? Something completely off topic. That is the immature way to avoid the situation. You are an idiot, a moron, the worst of the worst. Scum like you are the reason that Moparscape is looked down upon.

Just because you are jealous that you are not as good of a programmer as me, just because of jealousy gives you no right to spread your ignorance. I do plenty of programming, just most of it doesn’t get released, for it is for learning purposes. And honestly, I won’t get muted for a few posts, especially for this. Whenever you decide to group up and act like the mature man you say you are, then maybe we can talk.

Oh and I forgot to add.
I did say to stop making yourself look like a fool right? Thought so.[/quote]Now you are just making yourself look fucking retarded and immature.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:3, topic:431059”]Idiot. I have no need to talk to you. A computer with a quad core, 6gb ram, is a very nice computer. Your 145 bots were all from your ip, all one connection. There is a difference, a huge one. Fact is, the server is so shitty that LOIC can take it down. I mean fuck, if something like ion cannon can take it down, then it clearly is programmed poorly.[/quote]Funny. My 2003 Dell Desktop Dinasaur beats your computer’s ass. If you have no need to talk to me stop responding. And in fact, the bots were coming in from imsuperman05’s IP. GF?

Read full topic

And i don’t see what major thing’s you’ve edited/implied into this server of yours?
[/quote]

item.title: EvolutionX || Need Beta Testers || Getting VPS || Spawn || Stable
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“oblivion-pk, post:25, topic:430885”]the thing is there all based off of Dspk so does it really matter?[/quote]I don’t know where FormationX came from, not DSPK though. Rune(-)MTP was edited a bit and so on. Rune Sanctum was edited like crazy from MTP. Content and server satibility issues were added and improved. ResistancePK was built on with more stupid shit like dungeoneering and whatever they added. And Now its whatever Andrew and his other dev added. Its gone a long way from DSPK if it ever was. Doubt it though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“oblivion-pk, post:23, topic:430885”]Tbh

it seems like a insidia x with a few npc’s removed/moved

Imo Adding actionbuttons to the quest tab is easy and adding a line or two in clickingitems is very easy i don’t see why you would need to develop something that’s already been developed this seem’s more of a advertisement thread then a Development thread

^ ^ Not Flaming this is constructive criticism ^ ^

Nonetheless Goodluck[/quote]Isn’t based off Insidiax. Based off Rune Sanctum which was my old project and that was based off Rune(-)MTP which was based off FormationX. InsidiaX was based off HybridPvP

Read full topic
